mapper.insert:
insert into zh_load_trip_info ( load_id, trip_time, goods_weight, goods_volume, customer_bill_no, contract_image_ref_id, created_by, created_time )values ( #{loadId},
#{tripTime},
now(),
#{goodsWeight}, #{goodsVolume}, #{customerBillNo}, #{contractImageRefId}, #{createdBy}, now() )
mapper.update: update zh_load_trip_info set load_id=#{loadId}, trip_time=#{tripTime}, goods_weight=#{goodsWeight}, goods_volume=#{goodsVolume}, customer_bill_no=#{customerBillNo}, contract_image_ref_id=#{contractImageRefId}, created_by=#{createdBy}, created_time=now() where load_id=#{loadId}

update zh_load_trip_info
load_id=#{loadId},
trip_time=#{tripTime},
goods_weight=#{goodsWeight},
goods_volume=#{goodsVolume},
customer_bill_no=#{customerBillNo},
contract_image_ref_id=#{contractImageRefId},
created_by=#{createdBy},
created_time=#{createdTime}
where load_id=#{loadId}
mapper.select: select load_id, trip_time, goods_weight, goods_volume, customer_bill_no, contract_image_ref_id, created_by, created_time from zh_load_trip_info where load_id=#{loadId}
select load_id, trip_time, goods_weight, goods_volume, customer_bill_no, contract_image_ref_id, created_by, created_time from zh_load_trip_info where load_id=#{loadId}
